Posts.Content: Hi Chrissie.   I was diagnosed last June 13.   I am struggling with depression etc..  Would love to hear from you Vera.
Posts.Title: Anyone need a friend

Posts.Content: Hi Cat53     I have the very same pain in my effected arm.    I had a lumpectomy in July but had my nodes removed.    The pain feels like nerve pain to me.    It is in the inside of my arm and I can hardly lift my arm up.   I do the exercises but I feel like I am straining my arm.   I go for my radiotherapy on Monday 15 of them and shall ask them about the pain. Veronjon1
Posts.Title: Nerve pain or Letrozole pain ?
